Installation¶

in settings.py:

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'django_wysiwyg'
    ...
)

Other settings:

DJANGO_WYSIWYG_FLAVOR = 'yui'       # Default
# DJANGO_WYSIWYG_FLAVOR = 'ckeditor'  # Requires you to also place the ckeditor files here:
# DJANGO_WYSIWYG_MEDIA_URL = "%s/ckeditor" % MEDIA_URL
